title: Hitchhikers Guide to Participating in Open Source
summary:
Curious about being involved in open source, but haven't had the time to
make the plunge? Involved with open source but a bit hazy on the way it
all works? Open source legend Andrew Tridgell runs an annual week-long
post-graduate primer course teaching ""Free and Open Source Software
Development "". This talk will convey as much of this course as possible
in the time available.
